dcterms:description: A corpus containing 7490 Dutch anonymized medical records annotated with medical terms and contextual properties, focusing on negation detection.
dcterms:title: Erasmus Medical Center Dutch Clinical Corpus

dcterms:creator: Olivier Bodenreider
dcterms:description: A comprehensive biomedical terminology system that integrates various biomedical terminologies and classifications.
dcterms:title: Dutch Unified Medical Language System (UMLS)

dcterms:creator: Veronika Vincze
et al.
dcterms:description: A biomedical corpus annotated for uncertainty, negation, and their scopes, useful for training and evaluating negation detection systems.
dcterms:title: BioScope

dcterms:creator: Maria de Ridder
et al.
dcterms:description: A database containing integrated primary care information from Dutch general practitioners, useful for epidemiological research.
dcterms:title: IPCI database
